response.overview: “Teacher's Pet (The Training)” is about young student Chitose Misawa who falls in love with her new art teacher, Haruhiko Shimotsuki. However, there is a little problem: Haruhiko is the former lover of her older sister, Mariko. To make things worse, rumours about the love affair between the teacher and his pupil soon start doing the rounds in their school. Ultimately, it comes up that the teacher is having an affair with his work colleague …
response.tagline: Young student Chitose Misawa who falls in love with her new art teacher.
response.title: Teacher's Pet (The Training)
